title: Four of the choicest new songs as they are sung at court; written by a person of quality, named E.G.
author: E. G.
publisher: printed, and are to be sold by A. Chamberlain, in Red-Bull-Play-house yard, over against the Pound St. John-street,
notes: Verse -- "Young John the gardner having lately got".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
